alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cass; Dodge; Douglas; Lancaster; Saunders; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:54AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Lancaster, southwestern Dodge, Seward, western Douglas, southeastern Butler, Saunders and west central Cass Counties through 830 AM CDT... At 753 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of North Bend to 6 miles west of Weston to 3 miles northeast of Bee to Utica. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Valparaiso, Weston, Prague, Garland, Morse Bluff and Malmo around 800 AM CDT. Malcolm around 805 AM CDT. Seward, Wahoo, Ceresco, Cedar Bluffs and Raymond around 810 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Fremont, Milford, Inglewood, Davey, Ithaca, Colon, Woodcliff, Lincoln Airport, Lincoln, Mead, Pleasant Dale, Leshara, Waverly, Valley, Yutan, Emerald, Greenwood and Pioneers Park. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 369 and 412. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Butler; Cass; Dodge; Douglas; Lancaster; Saunders; Seward
